19Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. */
20
21/*
22
23@deftypefn Replacement char* xstrndup (const char *@var{s}, size_t @var{n})
24
25Returns a pointer to a copy of @var{s} with at most @var{n} characters
26without fail, using @code{xmalloc} to obtain memory. The result is
27always NUL terminated.
28
29@end deftypefn
30
31*/
32
33#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
34#include "config.h"
35#endif
36#include <sys/types.h>
37#ifdef HAVE_STRING_H
38#include <string.h>
39#else
40# ifdef HAVE_STRINGS_H
41# include <strings.h>
42# endif
43#endif
44#include "ansidecl.h"
45#include "libiberty.h"
46
47char *
48xstrndup (const char *s, size_t n)
49{
50 char *result;
51 size_t len = strnlen (s, n);
52
53 result = XNEWVEC (char, len + 1);
54
55 result[len] = '\0';
56 return (char *) memcpy (result, s, len);
57}
58
